p: Most J1a–J3 biofacies are dominated by a single taxon (biofacies M1, M2, M4, M5, M6 and M8: Table 1, Fig. 6), and have low richness (<5) and evenness (<0.4) (Table 2). Only biofacies M3 and M7 are not so dominated by a single species (Table 1, Fig. 6); they have richnesses of 5 and 12 and Simpson's indices of 0.5 and 0.8, greater than the other six biofacies from J1a–J3.
